tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** ** ********* ******* I have been taking my daughter to him since birth. Now she 8 and never there has been a chance that I wasn’t satisfied. Friendly and listens to your queries at length. In fact now most of my relatives and friends take their babies to him and thank me for recommending.
